Murals and Aerosol Art

Indoor and Outdoor murals to brighten up your business, home, or neighbourhood.

I haven't used spraypaint for very long, but it sure is fun. Painting on walls is something I've been doing since I was 14 - my bedroom in highschool was one big mural. I find murals are the best opportunity to collaborate with other artists, because there's so much space. I'd love to work with more 3D spaces.
